text: Serixiomimus flavus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Serixiomimus. It was described by Breuning in 1966.Biolib.cz - Serixiomimus flavus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1966 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Serixiomimus
